resources.string: The enterprise cloud workstations need to have access to [storage space] and [device information] to ensure the normal use of the application.

The enterprise cloud work station uses the [recording] permission, only for the normal use of voice, recording function, for normal use of recording function, please give the application to use 【recording】 permissions.

The enterprise cloud workbench uses the function of [camera], only for normal camera and sweep. If you want to use the camera function normally, please give the application permission to use 【camera】.

The Enterprise Cloud Workbench uses the [Location] permission, only for the check-in and location reporting functions. For normal use of the check-in function, please give the application permission to use [position].

The Enterprise Cloud Workbench uses the [Calendar] permission, which is used only for calendar synchronization and addition. For functions such as normal use of the calendar, please give the application permission to use [calendar].

The Enterprise Cloud Workbench uses the "Contacts" permission, which is only used to display contacts and search functions. We guarantee that we do not perform any operations involving user privacy. For normal use of related functions, Use the permissions of [address book].

If the required permission application fails, the function can not be used normally. For normal use, please open the relevant permission in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions].
Please turn on storage space and phone permissions in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to ensure the normal use of the application.
Please open the storage space permissions in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to use the Enterprise Cloud Workbench normally.

Use the [Phone] permission on the Enterprise Cloud Workbench to determine the local device ID to ensure the security of the account and do not dial other numbers or stop the call. Please open the phone privilege in the [Settings - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to log in to the application normally.
Please turn on camera permissions in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to take pictures, scan 2D code and other functions normally.
Please turn on the recording right in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permission] to use voice, recording and other functions normally.
Please turn on location permissions in [Settings - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to use normal sign-in, location reporting, and so on.
Please open the address book permissions in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to use functions such as toot, CRM, and display contacts.
Please open the SMS privilege in [Setup - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to use the application normally.
Please set the calendar permissions in the [Settings - Application - Enterprise Cloud Workbench - Permissions] to use the calendar and other related functions.
